property.name: icon
property.label: Icon
property.description: Text, icon used before heading, sourcing from Lightning Design System Icons, input for example: custom:custom1.

property.name: relatedListLabel
property.label: Related List Label
property.description: Text, used as table heading. E.g. Partners.

property.name: parentRecord
property.label: Parent Record
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. Account.

property.name: relatedRecord
property.label: Related Record
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. Contact.

property.name: siblingLookupField
property.label: Sibling Lookup Field
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. AccountId. Lookup field of the Sibling to the Parent Record

property.name: lookupField
property.label: Lookup Field
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. AccountId. Lookup field to the Parent Record

property.name: relatedListFields
property.label: Related List Fields
property.description: Text, written in array JSON format, use to provide information relevant to fields. E.g. [{"label":"Name","fieldName":"Name","type":"text"}]).

property.name: relatedListFilters
property.label: Related List Filters
property.description: Text, use to filter data. E.g. ‘Role_type__c = ‘Trainer’ OR Role_Type__c = 'Academic’.

property.name: sortField
property.label: Sort Field
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. CreatedDate
